DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study NF clinic Massachusetts General Hospital examine relationship psychosocial factor , health literacy , satisfaction medical visit adult NF1 , NF2 , Schwannomatosis . A total 89 participant enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between Psychosocial Factors , Health Literacy , Quality Life Satisfaction With Medical Visits Adults With NF
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 old 2 . Can read speak English 6th grade level 3 . Diagnosis neurofibromatosis type 1 , neurofibromatosis type 2 , schwannomatosis 1 . Severe active untreated major mental illness would interfere study participation , determine discretion study investigator ( e.g . untreated psychosis suicidality ) 2 . Unable unwilling participate 3 . Unable unwilling complete psychological assessment online via REDCap Assessment Center system .
